name: Simon Says (JLHM.XR)
description:
Improve your brain power with this visual, auditory and memory training!

How to Play:

1. Watch the buttons light up while listening to the notes play.
2. Repeat the sequence by pressing the buttons in the same order.

Sequence will get longer with each round.

How far can you get? 

Originally designed for for Android, adapted for web.

Get the original game in Google Play:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.JLHM.XR.SimonSays
